DOC.brief_summary: A multi-center placebo control , double-blind , trial compare analgesic efficacy safety Acetram ContramidÂ® BID versus placebo treatment acute low back pain patient 18 80 yrs age .
DOC.brief_title: A Two-Arm Study Comparing Analgesic Efficacy Safety Acetaminophen Tramadol Combination BID Versus Placebo Treatment Acute Low Back Pain
DOC.criteria: Males female generally good health age 1880 year moderate severe acute low back pain . Current acute low back pain episode within 48h prior study entry . Pain must moderate severe follow incident Chronic low back pain Ongoing history alcohol drug abuse Body Mass Index great 39 Treatment within last 3 week monoamine oxidase inhibitor ; tricyclic antidepressant tricyclic compound ; neuroleptic ; selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor Known history symptom suspicious cancer Significant renal liver disease Spinal surgery within 1 year study entry . Subjects pregnant lactating . Subjects unstable medical disease . Subjects receive treatment investigational product/device 30 day prior study entry .
